title: FS: T206 Cy Young portrait SGC 20 Sovereign
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cy Young portrait SGC 20 Sovereign
posts.post_content:
I have this on ebay but listing it here as well. $1,200 shipped. This was previously in REA; I just don't have a need for dupe portraits!

[url]https://www.robertedwardauctions.com/auction/2019/spring/306/1909-1911-t206-white-border-young-portrait-sovereign-150-back/[/url]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=356161&d=1560256110[/IMG]
What’s that on his chin? Looked like a tack hole at first, but the REA listing didn’t say anything about that, and the back scan doesn’t show a hole there.
